original: 聽從賈詡(字文和)「奉國家以正天下」之策，挾持獻帝把持朝政。李傕、郭汜、樊稠反目爭權大戰，使得關中地區變為廢墟。
text: Following Jia Xu's (ziwenhe) policy of 'respecting the country to rectify the world', he hijacked Emperor Xian to control the government. Li Wei, Guo Bang, and Fan Chou fought for power against the project, which turned the Guanzhong area into ruins.
